page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION
page.content: We studied the area around {Brook}and {Hulverstone}.These are in the South-West of the Island and are next to the sea. These are areas of intensive crop-growing,rough-grazing and silage;but is used mainly for {arable}farming rather than dairy or sheep farming. The land is hilly and attracts many tourists who admire the marvellous views to be seen. The coastline they see is one of rugged cliffs combined with sandy beaches,and the two villages{small}and {picturesque.}There are no local shops but public transport is available to the inhabitants who wish to travel to outside towns.
